export const emailTemplates = [ { id: 'welcome', subject: 'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I hope this message finds you well. My name is Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I'm contacting you to explore the possibility of creating a high-quality Google 360° virtual tour for {business_name}.

Working with various clients, including local cafes, bars, restaurants, car showrooms, offices, hotels, shops, and schools, I provide virtual tour services that have proven to benefit businesses in numerous ways. You can find more information about these benefits, along with a special introductory offer, at the following link: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I will be in the {business_location} area on {return_visit} and would like to schedule a brief meeting with you or the owner to discuss a proposal and answer any questions they may have. Please let me know if this is convenient, and I'd be happy to find a time that works best for you.

Please note that the investment solely covers the photography, creation of your virtual tour, and linking it to your Google business presence. Google does not receive any payment for this, and there are no ongoing fees, subscriptions, or hosting costs involved.

I'm excited about the opportunity to collaborate with {business_name} and showcase your offerings through our immersive 360° high-quality virtual tour experiences. Please feel free to reach out to me directly with any questions or to arrange a meeting.

Looking forward to hearing back from you!

Best regards,
Karl McClelland
karl@360spaces.co.uk
https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

` }, // Add more templates here ]; export const fillTemplate = (template: string, details: any) => { return template .replace(/{first_name}/g, details.first_name) .replace(/{business_name}/g, details.business_name) .replace(/{business_location}/g, details.business_location) .replace(/{return_visit}/g, details.return_date); }; export const emailSignature = `

[Holding Text - Edit in Outlook] `;
